蛮好玩的一款游戏。

J'ai, avec le recul, perdu 2000 précieuses heures de ma vie sur Dead By Daylight. Je retiens peu ou prou 400 heures de bons moments, à jouer avec des collègues ou des adversaires [i]chill[/i] et fair play. Le reste n'a été qu'abus, bugs, toxicité à outrance, montagnes de sel, fric gâché dans des DLC inutiles, et insultes. Ce jeu m'a rendu accro, et prisonnier d'une relation abusive que j'ai mis un moment à quitter.

J'ai commencé à jouer fin 2017, et j'ai pu voir Dead by Daylight proprement massacré par des développeurs cupides, plus prompts à enchaîner les tueurs et perks randoms pour faire rentrer un billet qu'à corriger les problèmes de leur jeu. Infichus d'équilibrer correctement leur jeu (en même temps, les 3/4 de la team de développementsont [i]hard stuck[/i] rang 15 depuis 5 ans), incapables d'écouter la communauté sur des points essentiels, ni de corriger des bugs importants qui sont restés présents pendant très longtemps - et le sont encore pour certains. Des décisions incompréhensibles pour attirer des joueurs tout frais et rendre le jeu plus accessibles, au détriment d'un camp comme de l'autre : le nerf de Ruine, par exemple. Sans parler de l'attitude franchement limite d'ajouter à un DLC payant une perk complètement  OP (Mettle Of Man), attendre que les sous rentrent, pour finalement la nerfer une fois les poissons dans le filet. A l'image des développeurs, à l'image de Mathieu Coté, de son accent anglais hésitant, de son goitre de trésorier d'une boîte qui est passée de petit studio indépendant à grosse machine de guerre - qui n'a, d'ailleurs, sorti qu'un seul jeu commercialement viable.

La seule chose qui profite à DbD, c'est d'être le seul de sa niche, et de s'être accaparé le trône. Malgré tous ses problèmes, c'est le seul soft qui aligne tueurs de licences et ce genre de gameplay asymétrique, raison pour laquelle il est très fréquenté, et par des joueurs qui alignent les milliers d'heure - la plupart tiennent d'ailleurs le même discours que moi : quel gâchis. L'observateur objectif ne pourra que constater la brochette de problèmes que le jeu continue d'enfiler, au fil des patches.

Oui, le gameplay est simple et accrocheur. Oui, jouer avec Myers ou encore Krueger, c'est franchement chouette. Oui, il y a un véritable [i]challenge[/i] à jouer tueur - survivant est un peu plus tranquille, mais pas moins intéressant. Mais ça ne suffit pas à faire oublier l'équilibrage à la ramasse : rang élevé et vous tombez contre un SWF (une team) ? Vous avez perdu si vous n'êtes pas surpuissant. Vous êtes survivant et le tueur, probablement salé, vous campe ? Vous avez probablement perdu, amusez vous bien à ne pas jouer pendant deux minutes. Ajoutez à ça la communauté la plus toxique et méprisable que j'ai pu rencontrer en seize ans de jeu en ligne sur Steam (et j'ai poncé Counter Strike), des développeurs à qui on filerait bien d'énormes baffes, et vous obtenez Dead By Daylight. En fait, l'équation est simple. Sur une heure de jeu, vous passerez 45 minutes atroces face aux pires déchets humains, pour 15 minutes de gameplay plaisant - ces quinze mêmes minutes qui vous feront, inlassablement, revenir au jeu.

A vous de voir, si le risque de perdre quelques centaines, voir millier d'heures, est une perspective qui vous enchante... Perso, j'aurais mieux fait de mettre ce temps à contribution pour apprendre une troisième langue ou à jouer d'un autre instrument de musique. La chose aurait été plus utile et surtout n'aurait pas raccourci mon espérance de vie de quelques années à cause d'un excès de sel.

TL;DR Fun game, buy it if you're into the idea of the game. You will become aggitated but you won't be dissapointed.

One of the funnest games I've played in years. Yes, you'll have to deal with some stupid people. Yes, the game has some glitches, bugs, and eploitable situations but if you can get past that and you love killing/surviving, you'll love this game. Personally, unless I'm playing with friends, I'm always the killer. Something about the chase and hook that just gets my endorphins flowing. The kill is nice and all but its not what gets me going. Hell, I've dropped people off at the exits rather than kill them just for shits and giggles.
Speaking of which, sometimes you'll get survivors just chilling at the exit, don't kill them. Yes, they are there for you to earn some points but don't be a dick and drop then hook them. Unless there's 2, then hook the one and let the other unhook them. Seriously, if they're willing to give you free points, don't be an ass and kill them. If they had you, accept it and get yourself some points. Trust me, most won't stick around for such shenanigans.
There is a lot of fun to be had at this game. If you don't like playing one side, don't play it. Nothing worse than someone who hates being a survivor or killer (that's why I'm rarely a survivor, don't much care for that side). However, if you start to get bored, play the other side for a match or 2. It's usually a good reminder of why you're always the other side. Works for me, anyways.
One of the last things I'll add is the killer is overpowered. Honestly, he/she really is. There is a reason for that, though. Survivors are not meant to survive on the own, (some survivors are exceptions but even they benefit from being with a group) you need to work together. A good team of survivors will make a killers life hell. Some of my favorite matches have been with survivors that work together. I usually lose those matches but they are also the ones I learn the most from. Its amazing how a good group of survivors can use all the benefits a killer has against him/her. You'll either love it or hate it but you have to appreciate it. As a killer, read some of the tutorials put out by survivors, they can be very useful. I found the one about juking to be eye opening, literally and figuretively. Learn their tricks and how to spot them, it'll make you a better killer. Probably piss off a few survivors too.
So, if you have a few bucks to throw on a game, get this one. Just watch out for people who accuse you of cheating just because you're streaming. Even if no one is watching the stream (still agitated by that prick). Some people take dying in a game way to seriously. Maybe he was just butthurt because he was hooked by a semi-competant killer (honestly, I suck but I have way to much fun to care). Get it on sale, pay full price, whatever just get it, you won't be dissapointed if you like this sort of game.
See you in the fog...

After playing this game shortly after it released and putting ~90 hours into it before quitting (terrible internet, loss of pips due to it, followed by rage) I thought I had my fill. I loved it but after almost 100 hours I thought I'd seen it all. Then all the updates, killers, survivers, maps, etc. came out. Coming back I have had so much fun, either from reliving the game again and relearning, to new experiences with all the additions and play styles. The Devs have a ton on their plate so I can expect things to have problems, but from how it used to be compared to now, it's improved a LOT, both for survivors and killers alike, so I have faith that if there are genuine problems, it'll be resolved in due time. Dead by Daylight is a fantastic game for anyone with a decent internet connection (maybe even a sub-par one like myself) and a drive to experience joy, anger, hope, despair, and several other emotions just on there own. Don't even get me started on how fun this game is to play with friends. (Drunk by Daylight anyone?)

밸런스가 안좋은건 둘째치고, 고인물 게임이라 매칭이 이상하다.

난 퍽 하나 가진 20급 뉴비 살인마인데, 보라색 퍽 네개가진 생존자들이랑 매칭되서 온갖 티배깅,  후레쉬질로 농락당한다. 

어렵사리 잡았더니 칼찌로 도망치질 않나 뺑뺑이 끝에 막타 쳤더니 아래 하얀색 게이지가 생기면서 한 번더 도망치질 않나 전부 살아간다.

그런 현실속에서 한명이라도 제대로 잡아보자고 캠핑했더니 게임끝나고 뻐킹 캠퍼라고 욕을 먹었다.

한명잡고 발전기 네개 켜지는데 왜 난 욕을 먹어야하는 것인가... 이런 경우가 매우 매우 많다...

생존자하면, 퍽이 하나밖에 없어 살인자를 따돌리는 기회조차없다. 그마저도 메그를 키운게 아니면 스플린트도 없다. (처음에 키워야하는 캐릭터가 정해져있다)

조용히 숨어서 발전기만 돌려야한다. 남을 구한다는거는 꿈도 못꾼다. 즉 재미가 없다.

막상 퍽들도 배우고 나서 자세히 살펴보면, 하나같이 수치가 이상하다. 좋은 것과 안좋은게 명확히 나눠져있다.

보너스를 한 50%씩 줘도 모자를판에 고작 몇퍼센트씩 늘어나는 것도 있고...해보긴 한건가?

현재문제들은 단순 수치조정만으로 밸런스를 맞출 수 있텐데 왜 안건드리지 하는 생각...

할때는 진짜 재밌게 했는데, 밸런스란 현실에 눈에 들어오고 나서는 좀 그렇다.

이런 환경에서 신규 유저들이 재미를 붙일지 진짜 의문이다...

퍽을 전부 개방하고 익숙해질때까지 고인물들에게 조리돌림당하고, 욕먹고, 민폐끼치면서게임을 

계속 붙잡고 있으라고? 멘탈이 남아나질 않는데...

더욱 끔찍한 것은 고인물들에 의하면 익숙해져도 이게임은 밸런스가 개판이라고 한다...

개발자가 지스타에서 몇달후에 대규모 패치가 있다고 했으니 그때 사는게 낫다고 생각한다.

的游戏23333333

因为意识的原因，新玩家上手会有点困难，而且经常会有意外的[strike]BUG[/strike]惊喜，不过我觉得这款游戏的制作组还是很用心的，愿意考虑中国玩家的想法和意见。[strike]除去那些暴躁的倒地拔线/三挣扎一放手老哥，[/strike]这款游戏的体验整体还不错
有一起Van的小伙伴来好友啊~（人皇大大带带我，屠皇GG求放过2333333）

[spoiler]给刚接触这款游戏喜欢玩人的萌新提点建议：
1.听到心跳别紧张，不要马上就跑，转转视角多观察，先观察一下屠夫的红光和方位，如果没有必要跑（例如屠夫在附近追别人，没有冲你来），那该干什么就继续干什么
2.看到有人溜屠夫就别当站地记者，该修GAY就修GAY，该拆钩就拆钩，不要逛大街什么都不做
3.修电GAY的时候专注一点，打QTE不求150但求50，不要总是爆米花
4.如果有队友被挂上钩了，要救就坚定地去救，不救就继续修GAY或者找火图腾，不要跑到附近当蘑菇，犹豫不决
5.救人补充：要救人记得卡一下屠夫视野，若非必要尽量不要强救，没有带怀表的话记得帮队友抗刀，不要把队友变成刷分的工具
6.自己上钩了心态不要炸，一阶段不要挣扎二阶段不要放手（放弃），要相信国服的环境是良好的，大部分玩家都会来救你的
7.如果想救人，但是屠夫一直守尸就不要再蹲蘑菇了，直接去点亮电GAY来给屠夫施压（屠夫如果继续守尸就很可能只有一杀了）
8.闲暇之余可以看看付导、怀老师等dalao的直播和录播，学学走位和意识，琢磨琢磨练习练习[strike]以提高自己的姿势水平[/strike]，离开秒倒的世界。
[/spoiler]
说到底这个游戏其实就是人屠之间的心理博弈与走位观察，没必要一惊一乍。
共勉~以上。
Maravilhoso

Ok, Dead By Daylight talk time.

Yes, I personally love this game. Keep in mind, this isn't for everyone. That's why you're greeted by two different styles of gameplay, whether you play as the hopeless survivors or the mencacing killer, it all depends on personal taste.
(Yes, I'm a survivor main. And I ain't hopeless.)

Anyways, lets move on to the review.

Pros:
Stunning graphics, believe it or not (max res)
Fast-paced AND slow-paced gameplay, there are a multitude of situations that could happen in the game.
Can sometimes actually be frightening
Very cheap but good DLC
Funny glitches ;)

Cons:
Glitches and bugs (players like to abuse them)
Camping killers (hooks)
Survivors can't injure or kill the killer (irony strike: this would actually be a cool idea lol)
Matchmaking can sometimes be... really bad.
Trollers
Players dont take the game seriously sometimes.
Rank 15s are matched with rank 20s against a rank 2 killer (this happened an hour before this review).

So... the question to answer is, is it good? Is it worth 20-30 dollars?
Yes, it is a good game.
Yes, it is worth the money.
Yes, it can be angering, but it's still worth it.

The fast paced gameplay when getting chased by a killer can actually be invigorating sometimes, believe it or not. Especially when you lose the killer. There's just that feeling of gratitude knowing that you could have possibly survived for literally another five minutes, or knowing that that escape bought your team enough time to finish generators and open the doors to escape the hell you were put through for about twenty minutes.

This game is fantastic sometimes, others, it's... not. At all.

The game isn't fun at all when you see a killer staring into the survivors eyes as he/she remained hooked for the next 2.5 minutes, and the survivors can do nothing to help them cus the killer would literally just redown them. This is where the killing and injuring of the killer would come in handy ;).

But anyways, when that doesn't happen and you're playing against a killer with actual skill, yes it is a great game and you will feel energy.

From a killer's perspective, you just gotta hope you're good. It's a type of game where you can easily get good at pretty much every killer if you put enough time and bloodpoints into the web, but if you don't do that, you're not going to be a good killer and you're usually going to average mostly petty victories every time (1 sacrificed survivor). You need to learn the ropes of every map available and the environment to see which angles and strike areas are best for you to maneuver, as you do pretty much everything slower than a survivor: going through windows, dealing with palets, disrupting gens takes away precious time of murdering them, hell even hooking a survivor causes precious time to be lost, as it can be used by the survivors for anything: finding items, repearing generators, destroying hooks, destroying traps, opening doors, etc. etc.

The game is impossible to become boring, is what im saying, as there are many applications that need tending too, much more than 1 killer or 4 survivors can handle without feeling stressed at some point during the game.

It's a very good game. 8/10, definitely can be improved like any other game (Except a Hat in Time cus that games already perfect <3).

Jogabilidade:
[*] Excelente jogabilidade, comandos faceis.
[*] Se sua conexão estiver ruim, n jogue, pois na hora de concertar gerador vai dificultar muito.
[*] Jogar de assassino, vc será o host,entao tenha uma boa conexão se não será mais dificil para vc.

Divertimento:
[*] De excelente divertimento ( se prepare pois da bastante sustos e desesperos, mas essa é a graça do jogo).
[*] Com amigos fica muito melhor (principalmente se estiverem por call).

Nota para o jogo: 9/10
With each update, the game becomes Pay2Win. Release new overpowered killer gets released. Then over weeks gets tuned down, only to release new overpowered killer with next update.

This game transformed my wife into an official gamer!  

When first starting to play this game, be sure to turn out the light and be prepared to have your heart beat out of your chest.  This is an exceptionally exciting game (especially for new players).  The basic mechanics are about as simple as it gets so it makes for an easy learning curve.  At the same time, there is a nice complexity to the game that builds with your experience so what appears simple on the surface actually can be quite intricate.  The DLC is pretty nice in terms of nostalgic value, and the most recent patch introduced some new mechanics as well that help keep the game from getting stale.  The only downside I have experienced this far is that the adrenaline rush doesn't come so much any more when the killer comes near after many hours of gameplay.  

Absolutely love the assymetry - too many games are cookie cutter, and this actually presents a real challenge when playing as a survivor.  Backstories for the characters are interesting and I wish they were fleshed out a bit more so that you could connect with them more as favorites.  If the devs could figure out a way to deal with "face camping killers" this would be a 10/10 for me.  

Excellent game - have gifted it to several friends - pick it up if you haven't already!

Tres bon jeu et addictif à souhait. 

CEPENDANT, une chose qui pourrait bien me pousser à ne plus jouer : les tueurs over cheate. Freddy ce n'est juste pas posssible ! Qu'est ce qui vous ont pris à faire un truc pareil ? Bon je dis ça mais la silhouette aussi est biiien cramée. Même avec le rush de 150% de vitesse, c'est du délire. 

Ah et aussi le survivant ne peut pas camp sans être suivi A LA TRACE par un corbeau alors que le tueur peut camp normal devant un crochet. Nous entendrons bien entendu des tueurs dirent que les survivants sont trop aidés dans le jeu ...

Et là je vous dis :  si il a le bon skill, le tueur, peut même passer fufu et réduire sa zone de terreur jusqu'au ravissant silence. Il peut empecher l'ouverture des portes et même interdire l'acces à la sortie pendant 60 secondes et reveler l'aura des survivants à proximité (notez l'approximation qui ne nous permet absolument pas de savoir où se placer, nous parler en mètres était trop demandé ?).
Bref il serait peut-être temps de changer cela non? 

A bon entendeur.

Edit 

Vous avez joué 710 heures de plus depuis votre dernier commentaire (merde je me savais maso mais la ...). Recommanderiez-vous ce jeu à d'autres personnes ? Bah en vrai oui, à des amis que tu détestes :)

Ok I'm editing this because i think I wrote this in 2018 for the memes. This game has a huge skill gap + console players. If you decide to buy this game it will be annoying in the first 50hrs or so, bot don't give up just yet! If you have maybe a friend to play with it can start be fun as a survivor. Going in as a killer for the first time will be easier if you don't stumble into a guy who has 2k hrs (speaking from experience). I recommend that you watch some youtubers play, like Ayrun, Monto or No0b3 or even tutorials to get an experienced  point of view. I may not be so trust worthy with my 179hrs but I hope my review helped you!
 [h1]And don't forget to never be toxic even if a Bubba camps you![/h1]

Do yourself a favour and don´t buy this game! Trust me!

I played the game about 350 hours and all I can say is:

Unfortunately the developers patched and updated the game more and more to its death like it is now.
Every update making the bugs more worse and don´t fix them instead.

I can list a few "bad" things:
- the game crashes a lot and your offerings (which can be very valuable) are gone with the wind...
- bugs: sound, pallets, hitboxes, laggs, weird stuff too, points are not shown or counting correctly, and so on...
- can´t find a lobby for hours. (alone and with friends)
- if you find a lobby either the ping is catastrophic or you get disconnected or dodged by the killer
- as i said before updates are not killing bugs they cause them
- most of the new killers and survivours you have to buy
- they sell more and more stuff before making the game works correctly after at least 2 years of release
- the community is one of the most toxic i´ve ever seen
- if you play fair you get bullied by the suvs and if you play unfair you get more bullied by the suvs or killer
- the ranking system is complete bullshit and resets every month so rank 1 have to play with rank 20 players
- and unfortunately many more problems

And the best of all: "I think we did a pretty good job so far" xD

If everyone would work like the dbd devs do, then good night...

I love your game! But maybe you could do this as a future Update...A Killer-Party Mode. Let me explain:
Killer-Party Mode:
Killers:
-Can be Up to 4 Killers
-Each Killer gets a random perk
-The Perks are at teir 3
-Found by making a party!
-killers can see other killers auras
-Killers can not be within 15 meters of the survivors on hooks for 60 seconds

Survivors:
-Can be up to 16 survivors (Following the 4 survivors, 1 killer rule)
-Have to repair 10 generators (at max)
-Get a random item rare or lower
-Survivors get easier skill checks
-If they mess up a skill check, the killers gets alerted and the survivors working on that generator cant move for 3 seconds
-Survivors can always see the other survivors locations
-Can not sabotage hooks
-Survivors automacilly get borrowed time...
-Can join in matchmaking (or party)
-Survivors get one perk of thier choice at tier 3

Um jogo sem igual, com uma mecânica incrível e viciante. Poucos foram os jogos que me prendaram como esse. Deixa um pouco a desejar por conta de personagens desbalanceados como o Freddy e o Wraith. contudo, não são fatores que estraguem a experiência com o jogo.

I love this game so much , but sadly as much as i love it i can't recomend it ! Wanna know why ? It fucking sucks :( If you play survivor is ok but if you play killer...God forbid ! Well let's start with the palets : if you find a looper he will go around the obstacles in the palet area for well , let's say forever , and it fucking sucks cause you have to catch the dude and you lose time by doing so ! Also if you let him go cause you don't wanna spend precious time by trying to catch him bad for you , cause guess what , he is still alive ! As for the windows , omfg , on the Institute and Hadon it's a fucking nightmare , and Springwood and Auto are super full of palets , yep , you're right , you are as good as dead on this map and wow , you play killer which cannot die ! If we are talking about generators , well , that's the most fucking OP part of the game for survivors , they can repair it , but not one , not two , all 4 of them ! 4 survivors on a generator ? Let's rush them all then , and holly sweet mother of cool games , they really do it , just to make you get angry ! About perks , hmmm , they cand disable your perks if you are using a hex for instance ! Now let me get this straight , it's 4 against one , you can do all this shit i just talked about and you can also disable my hex ? Jesus christ , so unbalanced ! You wanna know about items ? All are cool , really , but the flashlight ... isn't it too fucked up when i work so hard  to catch a survivor and when i finally do , one of you comes around and blinds me with the almighty flashlight that is so powerful than the fucking sun itself ? Let's not forget about body blocking , oh yeah , that part of the game when i catch someone and i try to take him to a hook , but guess what ? Survivors can rush your ass and block you so can't get to the hook ! Of course you will hit them to get away but that means only more time for the survivor to wiggle and get free from your grasp ! Also , if you didn't know if they down a palet on your ass you will drop the survivor , cool right ? And finally , after you worked you ass so much for almost nothing , they power the generators and they can escape but it's ok cause you say : ok , i'll guard the gate and they won't get out ! Sadly my friend , they have 2 gates they can use to escape ! Like it's not enough , they also have a hatch spawned somewhere on the map that leads to freedom ! I would be ok with all of that , cause when they release a DLC i pay for that motherfucking killer to have it as paid for it but no , a crybaby survivor can complain cause it's right to do so , and my dear killer that paid money for gets nurfed ( cause it's OP . you know ) to the point that he is no longer a killer , just a useless puppet that i can control and get shit done with it , cause it was OP once and needed to be nerfed ! Don't get me wrong , the idea of the game is awesome , but seriously it's too fucking unbalanced in the advantage of the survivors ! If you want to play survivor with your friends it's cool , yo will have lots of fun , but if you are buying the game for the killers you are giving your money for nothing ! With all that being said , fuck your game , untill you don't do something to balance this shit i'm out ! You guys just lost not only a customer but also a devoted player !

В целом игра отличная,но сурвов по отношению к маньякам сильно переапали. Если ситуация не изменится, то это будет очередной мертвый проект. Но потуги в сторону изменений вроде просматриваются, хоть и очень слабо. Маньяки в этой игре - это сурвы. Основных маньяков в этой игре с каждым днем все меньше. Причина этому - токсичные сурвы, которые будут тебя троллить, а при твоей победе, писать тебе все,что о тебе думают, при твоем проигрыше так же. Это игра для тех, кто хочет играть сурвом. Все сделано только для сурвов. 

Игру я не порекомендую. Ибо такой лютый дисбаланс наверное только в провалившемся Батлфронт 2 и скандалом с EA games.
